column4: sure is nice to have some consistency between linux and win98
now with gimpshop and oo2 it is easy to port documents, images between them
well, i am just pleased to have consistency between the two computers
its only illegal if you end up in jail for it.
well..not really because everyone has a conscience
although the fear of jail does influence some
I have a conscience... I also like that conscience to not effect my in a negative way...
I love music... and require pr0n... if I don't have the codecs... I'd go insane, and start raping females... I think my choice is relative good...
well i let people make their own decisions...but i try to stay aware of the environment
plus I need Java too... but other than that... everything here is free... oh and Flash... bah
well there is gnuflash that worked on gentoo
yes some things are restricted to only paying customers so you have to respect the producer's decision
I use Linux because I didn't want to steal software anymore... but some things I just refuse to go without...
it is simply a fundamental disagreement between the consumer who wants to save money and the producer who wants to make money
